## Linted files

- File extensions:
  - `.cpp`
  - `.h`
  - `.cc`
  - `.hpp`
  - `.cxx`
  - `.cu`
  - `.hxx`
  - `.c++`

## Configuration in MegaLinter

| Variable                 | Description                   | Default value |
|--------------------------|-------------------------------|---------------|
| CPP_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE | Custom regex including filter |               |
| CPP_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE | Custom regex excluding filter |               |
